title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Creating pictures using different modes
description:
In this video I will show you how you can create pictures in MSFS 2020 using the different modes in MSFS 2020. We will look at the different camera modes but also how to remove any unwanted information from the screen and use the weather options to create stunning pictures.
